TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfessionalColors extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides structures that are colors of a Windows display element. This class cannot be inherited.

Docs.summary: Gets the starting color of the gradient used in the image margin of a .
Docs.value: A that is the starting color of the gradient used in the image margin of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> must be set to `true` for this color to be displayed.
